item.title: Schiff Puts Hold on Trump US Attorney Nominee for D.C.
item.description: Sen. Adam Schiff, D-Calif., announced Tuesday that he's placing a hold on President Donald Trump's nominee for U.S. attorney in Washington, D.C.
